quotes.quote: Life can be a piece of art, a magic enchantment, a fetching fairy tale or an adventurous story trimmed with alluring episodes. But it may as well be a delusive or hazardous act with many wildcat players seeming to be what they are actually not.
Incidentally, the world is magical. Magic is simply what's off our human scale... at the moment.

The psychic witch lives in a state of enchantment, seeing all things as magical and understanding that the universe is composed of endless possibilities and potential. The psychic witch sees a door where others see a wall
Enchantment, even for a day, can make a whole life bearable.
We're invited to pay attention to the enchanted world around us in a new way, to be open to the possibility of an encounter with God at every moment.
A sensual lifestyle is all about making a shift from the old way of thinking and stepping into a new one that allows you to be more enchanting.
Every repast can have soul and can be enchanting; it asks for only a small degree of mindfulness and a habit of doing things with care and imagination.
People who resist their sensuality resist a better version of themselves and, essentially, their own evolution towards living a more enchanting life.
We come into the world with an inherent awareness of the magical and an understanding of the enchanted life.
Every age can be enchanting, provided you live within it.
Charm: the quality in others that makes us more satisfied with ourselves.
If it is enchantment, I hope it is forever. If it is a dream, I wish never to awaken.
Your power has enchanted me, I stand helpless against it. Come to me now, tonight let me worship you in my arms.
I have seen the lights in your eyes / And now  / I am glorifying my tragic destiny / Dreams can be wholesome for me / Life is a tormented dream for me / Mesmerize me, enchant me
I hear a laugh, it awoke my soul / The wind takes the leaves / Where he wants them to go / His tunes enchant our world / Our thoughts and leave us frozen

However even if these tiny and inconspicuous little things didn't make the slightest of impact on any of the animate world; they were definitely enough to metamorphose my life from one of gloom and constant despair; to enchanting paradise.
And the celestial stupor which the savagely bubbling / day thoroughly failed to provide; was profoundly / imparted by the magnificently enchanting night.
Enchanting scenes of young delight, / How changed since first ye rose to sight; / Since first ye rose in infant glories drest / Fresh from the wave, and rear'd your ample breast
It flashes o'er the bright'ning deep, / It softens Britain's frowning steep— / 'Tis mild benignant Peace, enchanting form! / That gilds the black abyss, that lulls the storm.
And Loch Avoulyen lies like a silver sea with its forests green, / With its fields of rushes and headlands most enchanting to be seen
Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
Having a delightful life of worship requires you to constantly thank God for His mercies in a similar way that you pray for your daily needs.
We want life to be more than just the daily grind; we want it to have meaning and purpose. We want it to have enchantment.

quotes.cite: George Douglas Campbell Duke of Argyll
quotes.quote: Delightful is that, and delightful / The salt main on which the seagulls cry / On my coming from Derry far; / Is is quite, and it is delightful.
This is why the first step of enchantment is to get people to like you. To accomplish this, you'll need to accept others and find something to like in them.
Imagine working for someone you've enchanted. This benefits include freedom, flexibility, and mentoring.
Enchantment can occur in villages, stores, dealerships, offices, boardrooms, and on the internet. It causes a voluntary change if hearts and minds and therefore actions.
Enchantment transforms situations and relationships. It converts hostility into civility.
Fascination is an instinctive form of connection. We all have this ability in some form. But over time, people can lose their innate ability to fascinate.
On the day you were born, you already knew how to fascinate. Like breathing and swallowing and smiling. the ability to fascinate is a hardwired survival mechanism.
The sacred dimension of romance is what lovers long for now: the magical space of an enchanted intimacy.
Ladies and gentleman, ladies and gentleman... this world, this world that we live in is full of enchantment for those with eyes to see it.
There again, we could be foolish not to quit while we're ahead. For distance lends enchantment.
An enchanting word. So civilized, and full of possibilities.
Enchantment and seduction were fine means of persuasion, but when time is short, an awkward but quick concussion could better serve a girl's purpose.
Enchantment is the oldest form of medicine.

Enchantment is the purest form of sales. Enchantment is all about changing people's hearts, minds and actions because you provide them a vision or a way to do things better. The difference between enchantment and simple sales is that with enchantment you have the other person's best interests at heart, too.
Enchantment lies in everyday moments if you are observant.
Life's enchanted cup sparkles near the brim.
When you enchant people, your goal is not to make money from them or to get them to do what you want, but to fill them with great delight.
In order to be enchanted we must be, above all, capable of seeing another person simply opening one's eyes will not do.
From the very fountain of enchantment there arises a taste of bitterness to spread anguish amongst the flowers.
The enchanted day is only enchanted if we ourselves believe that anything is possible.
